page.title: 20Angling In Kingswood.
page.content: The hobby of{Angling}is very popular amongst young people In Kingswood. I recently went{fishing}on the River Avon at Swineford with my friends. When we got there we found a spot and started to{fish}I landed the first eel, it had swallowed the{hook}which was hard to get out. Then I{cast}out but the leger hit a tree and I lost it. A leger is large weight which helps the{angler}to{cast}out a long way. I had to start again but it did not take long. My friend caught another{eel}and we put it in the {keepnet. }Our biggest catch was a {Chub,}about 14 inches long. The average size of an adult{Chub}is 23 inches. Other{fish}which may be caught in this stretch of{river}are{Perch, {Carp, Dace, Gudgeon and Pike. Eels}are a nuisance because they tangle in the net. My{rod}is made of{fibreglass.
